devdoc.author: ricardo85x
devdoc.details: allow users to rent a room in the dApp Inn.

addRoomService(string,uint256).details: add a service so guest can buy it.

returns._0: the balance in this smart contract.

getRoomTab(uint8).details: I could not directly use rooms[num].tab from etherjs So I created this function.

setNumberOfRooms(uint8).details: please verifify manualy if the room is empty before continue.

setRoomPrice(uint8,uint256).details: set price to zero when you want to use defaultRoomPriceInWei.

devdoc.title: Dapp Inn

buyRoomService(uint8,uint8).notice: buy a service to make your stay more happy.

checkOut(uint8).notice: checkout the user before the checkoutDate.

setNumberOfRooms(uint8).notice: set the number of rooms available to rent.
